Parameters:

Returns:

user’s chat list and contact list

backend.base_route.route.connect()[source]

to connect room of package flask-socketio :return:

backend.base_route.route.disconnect()[source]

when user leaves chat this funtion updates user’s status :return:

backend.base_route.route.logout()[source]

log out function :return:

backend.base_route.route.message(data)[source]

User can send message and another user can view it :param data: infos to create msg and update status msg :return: created msg and updated msg

backend.base_route.route.online_user()[source]

to filter User model by session :return:

backend.base_route.route.sign(type_request)[source]
